amendment.description: Amendment adds a new section requiring the amount made available to the Transportation Security Administration for screeing operations, not more than $2,760,503,458 may be used for screener personnel, compensation, and benefits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section requiring the amount made available to the Transportation Security Administration for screeing operations, not more than $2,760,503,458 may be used for screener personnel, compensation, and benefits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A058) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 204 (Roll no. 406).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A058) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 204 (Roll no. 406).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A058) offered by Mr. Mica.
